summary: This is an email chain regarding the privilege review of 'RG' texts, where an Assistant United States Attorney from the SDNY requests a spreadsheet of priority texts be sent to Janis and others, with an attached spreadsheet file.

persons.name: Janis
persons.role: Recipient of documents for privilege review project
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who needs materials for the 'RG Privilege Review' project; the email asks if anything else she needs should be sent.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the initial email requesting that priority 'RG' texts from a spreadsheet be forwarded to Janis and others for the privilege review project.

connections.description: The AUSA is directing or facilitating the sending of documents (RG texts) to Janis for a privilege review project.

events.title: RG Privilege Review Coordination
events.description: Email correspondence regarding the isolation and forwarding of priority 'RG' texts in a spreadsheet for a privilege review project.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated January 19, 2020, concerning a privilege review of texts associated with 'RG'.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is involved in coordinating the review.
A spreadsheet titled 'Giulianni Comets ForReview 1.19.2020.xlsx' was attached, containing isolated priority 'RG' texts.
The correspondence indicates an ongoing legal process involving document review and privilege assertions.
